title: Revolutionary Road -best understood to be ironic

content.prompt: Which of the following is best understood to be ironic?

choices.label: “thumbs the leaves of his appointment calendar” (paragraph 3)
“his blood runs cold again as the galaxies revolve” (paragraph 4)
“He has brought order out of chaos” (final sentence of the passage)

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
